column3: I think this is going the wrong way. We deliberately left debug symbols out of travis previously, re-introducing them in #12686 was an oversight. That much cache is unsustainable imo.\n\nWhat we really want is a version of --enable-debug for c-i which doesn't turn on -gX, as it's just wasted space.
Agree with @theuni , I'll try to find a way to get rid of -g flag\n
